name: Around the globe
description: Take a trip into outerspace and see the world like never before. Stay aboard the ISS for 2 weeks and get a peek at what life for astronauts is really like.

features.name: A killer view
features.description: view all the wonders of the world, from 250 miles above

features.name: Authentic Astronaut Living
features.description: Eat, Sleep, and Breathe in space, experience life in space and get a taste of the future of the human race.

name: Low Orbit Joyride
description: Cross over the Kármán Line and see the curvature of the earth. On your 12 minute journey you will be able to float around above the earth and get a magnificent view.

features.name: Life changing, at a fraction of the price
features.description: See the world like very few have without spending a fortune.

features.name: Our Quickest Trip
features.description: Want to see space but also be back home in time for family dinner? The Low Orbit Joyride let's you see all the beauties of space and get you back to your life the next day.

name: Space walk
description: Take a step out into space. Travel into earth orbit and get to experience a space walk.

features.name: Leave the ship
features.description: Float through space, safely tethered to your vessel. Let the vastness of space overwhelm you.

name: One Small Step
description: Become one of the very few lucky individuals to have stepped onto the moon. Coming soon in 2025.
